org.restlet
Interface Chainlet

All Superinterfaces:
Restlet
public interface Chainlet
extends Restlet

Chainer of calls to a target restlet. Automatic delegation is provided to the attached restlet. Filtering work can be done in the handle() method, just remember to call the delegate() method before or after your custom handling.
Note that during this handling, the restlet call paths are not supposed to be modified.

Method Summary
 void attach(Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
          Attaches a restlet class.
 void attach(Restlet restlet)
          Attaches a restlet instance shared by all calls.
 void detach()
          Detaches the current target restlet.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.restlet.Restlet

Method Detail

attach

void attach(Restlet restlet)
Attaches a restlet instance shared by all calls.

Parameters:
restlet - The restlet to attach.

attach

void attach(Class<? extends Restlet> restletClass)
Attaches a restlet class. A new instance will be created for each call.

Parameters:
restletClass - The restlet class to attach (must have a constructor taking a RestletContainer parameter).

detach

void detach()
Detaches the current target restlet.
